comment.text: Text for a button or link allowing a user to leave an agent or room, used in dialogs, panels, and context menus. The wording will change depending on whether the user is interacting with an AI agent or a regular room. Translators should ensure it clearly indicates the action of exiting.

usage.context:
item.id !== this.selectedFolderStore.id,
 },
 {
 id: "option_leave-room",
 key: "leave-room",
 label: isAIAgent ? t("LeaveTheAgent") : t("LeaveTheRoom"),
 icon: LeaveRoomSvgUrl,
 onClick: this.onLeaveRoom,

 isArchive || !item.inRoom || isPublicRoom || Boolean(item.external),
 },
